formal_name:
Little Red Riding Hood's
Zombie BBQ
description:
Can you save fairy tale land or will you let its creatures live an unhappy-ever-after-life?

Zombie BBQ is a really fun shooter, where you have to move forward by shooting down every living (or dying) creature in your path! Use the great arsenal of weapons at your disposal to do away with the savage hordes of zombies.
name:
Little Red Riding Hood's
Zombie BBQ
